com.inrix.sdk

Class IncidentUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.IncidentUtils

  • public class IncidentUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains static methods that are useful in managing incidents.

      • IncidentUtils

        public IncidentUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • isRoadClosure

        public static boolean isRoadClosure(java.lang.Integer eventCode)
        Returns whether an event code is a road closure, per ISO 14819-1:2003.
        Returns:
        true if the event code is a road closure; otherwise, false.

      • getDefaultComparator

        public static java.util.Comparator<Incident> getDefaultComparator()
        Gets the default incidents comparator for sorting for alerts. This comparator gives priority to most important incidents first, then prioritizes them by distance.
        Returns:
        The default comparator for alerts.

      • getDefaultListComparator

        public static java.util.Comparator<Incident> getDefaultListComparator()
        Get default incidents comparator for sorting for displaying incidents in a list. This comparator gives priority to most important incidents first, then prioritizes them by distance
        Returns:
        The default comparator for displaying in a list.

      • getDefaultFilter

        public static AlertsManager.IFilter<Incident> getDefaultFilter()
        Gets the default filter. This filter excludes construction incidents.
        Returns:
        The default filter.
